playerattributescreen.client.attribute_s:
Defines what attributes are displayed on the attribute screen.
Each string must conform to a specific format.
Read the readme file of this mod for more information.

Note that editing this list outside of the game via the config file might be easier.
playerattributescreen.server.disable_pla: Disable Attribute Screen For All Connected Clients
playerattributescreen.server.use_attribu: If set to false, the client config is used.
playerattributescreen.server.attribute_s:
Defines what attributes are displayed on the attribute screen.
Each string must conform to a specific format.
Read the readme file of this mod for more information.

Note that editing this list outside of the game via the config file might be easier.
